alert.note: Alert for Phillips (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 27 at 7:04PM CDT until April 27 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Phillips County in eastern Arkansas... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 704 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Holly Grove, or 13 miles southeast of Clarendon, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Marvell, Watkins Corner, Lake View, Kindall, Poplar Grove, Turkey Scratch, Kingtown, Gobell, Trenton and Cypert. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
